DOC.brief_summary: - To compare effect pramipexole depressive symptom early advance PD patient - To evaluate course depressive symptom measure UPDRS Part I ( mentation , behavior mood ) HADS-D pramipexole treatment - To investigate whether improvement depressive symptom link improvement motor function ( UPDRS Part III )
DOC.brief_title: Non-interventional Observational Study With Pramipexole : Impact Non-motor Symptoms Parkinson 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : 1 . Idiopathic Parkinsons disease without fluctuation 2 . Indication treatment Sifrol® 3 . Male female patient age 4 . Presence least mild depressive symptom ( judged treat physician ) 5 . Ability reliably complete selfrating scale ( HADS ) Exclusion criterion : 1 . Any contraindication accord Summary Product Characteristics ( SPC ) : hypersensitivity pramipexole excipients . 2 . Ongoing treatment Sifrol® .
